医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
中风和心脏病患者发现免疫功能障碍机制德国每年有 250,000 至 300,000 人患有中风或心脏病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Immune-dysfunction-mechanism-discovered-in-中风-and-heart-attack-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Immune-dysfunction-mechanism-discovered-in-中风-and-heart-attack-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3f1ad0a-002c-4078-9b4c-eefb52dcdab1 Tue, 23 Apr 2024 14:14:57 -0400 Immune dysfunction mechanism discovered in stroke and heart attack patients
PCORI 资助超过 1.5 亿美元支持新的以患者为中心的临床有效性研究以患者为中心的结果研究所 (PCORI) 今天宣布批准总额超过 1.5 亿美元的资助，以支持新的以患者为中心的比较临床有效性研究 (CER)、旨在加强以患者为中心的 CER 的严谨性和质量的研究以及一个将 PCORI 资助的研究成果付诸实践的项目。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/PCORI-funds-more-than-24150-million-to-support-new-patent-centered-clinical-effectness-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/PCORI-funds-more-than-24150-million-to-support-new-patent-centered-clinical-effectness-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a1e8944a-0936-4858-bfa1-5b8019b8394b Tue, 23 Apr 2024 13:59:00 -0400 PCORI funds more than $150 million to support new patient-centered clinical effectiveness research
社交媒体信息可能会影响年轻人对精神疾病的看法即使社交媒体信息措辞上的细微差别也可能足以动摇年轻人对抑郁症和焦虑症及其治疗的看法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Social-media-messages-may-sway-young-peoples-beliefs-about-mental-illness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Social-media-messages-may-sway-young-peoples-beliefs-about-mental-illness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0946a5d0-4b37-4302-addf-d9bf4c46d1dc Tue, 23 Apr 2024 13:36:13 -0400 Social media messages may sway young people's beliefs about mental illness
研究现有药物对罕见免疫疾病患者的疗效和安全性本月，DRIMID 联盟（DRIMID 代表罕见免疫介导炎症药物重新发现）的第一项研究已经开始。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Investigating-the-efficacy-and-safety-of-existing-drugs-in-病人-with-rare-immune-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Investigating-the-efficacy-and-safety-of-existing-drugs-in-病人-with-rare-immune-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1e52d724-3b90-42fd-ae38-9fb57f4d06b4 Tue, 23 Apr 2024 13:26:56 -0400 Investigating the efficacy and safety of existing drugs in patients with rare immune diseases
噬菌体来源的溶素可用于靶向腋窝中引起异味的细菌腋窝的体味来自细菌代谢顶浆腺产生的汗液。这些细菌原产于我们的皮肤，但产生的气味因人而异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Bacteriophage-driven-lysin-could-be-used-to-target-odor-causing-bacteria-in-armpits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Bacteriophage-driven-lysin-could-be-used-to-target-odor-causing-bacteria-in-armpits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=389f4f73-fea4-48c4-970d-87bc9f327087 Tue, 23 Apr 2024 13:20:32 -0400 Bacteriophage-derived lysin could be used to target odor-causing bacteria in armpits
临床前研究表明，创新的疟疾前药以肝脏为靶点，增强疗效，同时降低毒性他非诺喹是一种前药，可以满足大规模根除运动的标准。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Innovative-malaria-prodrug-targets-liver-enhances-efficacy-while-reducing-毒性-preclinical-studies-show.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Innovative-malaria-prodrug-targets-liver-enhances-efficacy-while-reducing-毒性-preclinical-studies-show.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cdea98a6-c7e9-408d-ad18-83f71f528105 Tue, 23 Apr 2024 10:02:00 -0400 Innovative malaria prodrug targets liver, enhances efficacy while reducing toxicity, preclinical studies show
CN Bio 在首轮 B 轮投资中筹集了 2100 万美元Bayland Capital 和创始股东 CN Innovations Holdings Ltd 分别投资 1000 万美元和 550 万美元。投资将扩大产品开发和组织规模，以满足对器官芯片（OOC）解决方案不断增长的需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/CN-Bio-raises-2421-million-USD-in-first-close-of-Series-B-investment-round.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/CN-Bio-raises-2421-million-USD-in-first-close-of-Series-B-investment-round.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b16d5e1-ee9f-4e55-80ee-5b1cf8de5d32 Tue, 23 Apr 2024 07:58:00 -0400 CN Bio raises $21 million USD in first close of Series B investment round

新的 QR4 算法在预测心血管疾病风险方面优于之前的模型一种新的心血管风险预测算法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/New-QR4-algorithm-outperforms-previous-models-in-predicting-cardioangio-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/New-QR4-algorithm-outperforms-previous-models-in-predicting-cardioangio-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30211b29-efa0-40fe-adeb-faa47d0e3ec5 Tue, 23 Apr 2024 07:05:00 -0400 New QR4 algorithm outperforms previous models in predicting cardiovascular disease risk
无家可归的人因重新决定混乱而失去医疗补助二月一个寒冷的早晨，在蒙大拿州西北部城市弗拉特黑德保暖中心，塔西娅·埃文斯 (Tashya Evans) 正在等待医疗补助申请的帮助，而避难所的其他人则在为这一天做好准备。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Unsheltered-people-are-losing-Medicaid-in-remetry-mix-ups.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Unsheltered-people-are-losing-Medicaid-in-remetry-mix-ups.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=95f46527-f025-4edf-ad58-1bedeb93edac Tue, 23 Apr 2024 06:39:11 -0400 Unsheltered people are losing Medicaid in redetermination mix-ups
